pages.title: Blue Skies
pages.text: Find the Gatekeeper and trade some emeralds to get the Zeal Lighter. Somewhere in or near his house will be an unlit portal of either Turquoise or Lunar Stone Bricks. They take you to the Everbright and the Everdawn dimensions repectivley.
Use the Zeal Lighter on a portal frame of either Turquoise Stone Bricks or Lunar Stone Bricks. $(br)

pages.title: The Everbright
pages.text: The Everbright is a realm of eternal day and frigid cold. Home to large beasts and ethereal mobs, you’ll need to keep an eye on your back as you traverse through this world. Be sure to watch out for snow storms that bring thick fog and more enemies than usual. As you explore, you’ll encounter the Summoner’s Blinding Dungeon and the new Nature Dungeon, home of the Starlit Crusher.

pages.title: The Everdawn
pages.text: The Everdawn has its sun forever rising. With this being a much more humid and warm world, insects and reptiles flourish. Before entering, it’s worth preparing for poison and fire as many parts of this world may inflict those on you. Venture across this diverse landscape to uncover the Alchemist’s Blinding Dungeon and then the new Poison Dungeon, lair of the Arachnarch.
